{
    "pattern": "CREATE TABLE t (c INT <constraint_type_parameter>); INSERT INTO t <dml_values_parameter>; SELECT <select_parameter>();",
    "applied_rules": [
        "<constraint_type_parameter>",
        "<dml_values_parameter>",
        "<select_parameter>"
    ],
    "Affected Elements": "last_insert_id() function",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The last_insert_id() function returns the last auto-increment value generated by the current session, which may not correspond to the actual row ID when explicit values are inserted."
}
